00200 // thread-safety checks
00201 // These checks are for development purposes, to check that certain objects are
00202 // properly used within the framework. Leaving them enabled during application
00203 // development may cause false positives, e.g., when threadsafety is ensured
00204 // outside of the objects by the application.
00205 
00206 #ifndef NDEBUG
00207 #  define EQ_CHECK_THREADSAFETY
00208 #endif
00209 
00211 #define EQ_TS_VAR( NAME )                        \
00212     struct NAME ## Struct                                   \
00213     {                                                       \
00214         NAME ## Struct ()                                   \
00215             : extMutex( false ), inRegion( false )          \
00216             {}                                              \
00217         mutable co::base::ThreadID id;                      \
00218         bool extMutex;                                      \
00219         mutable bool inRegion;                              \
00220     } NAME;                                                 \
00221 
00222 #ifdef EQ_CHECK_THREADSAFETY
00223 #  define EQ_TS_THREAD( NAME )                                          \
00224     {                                                                   \
00225         if( NAME.id == co::base::ThreadID::ZERO )                       \
00226         {                                                               \
00227             NAME.id = co::base::Thread::getSelfThreadID();              \
00228             EQVERB << "Functions for " << #NAME                         \
00229                    << " locked to this thread" << std::endl;            \
00230         }                                                               \
00231         if( !NAME.extMutex && NAME.id != co::base::Thread::getSelfThreadID( )) \
00232         {                                                               \
00233             EQERROR << "Threadsafety check for " << #NAME               \
00234                     << " failed on object of type "                     \
00235                     << co::base::className( this ) << ", thread "       \
00236                     << co::base::Thread::getSelfThreadID() << "  != "   \
00237                     << NAME.id << std::endl;                            \
00238             EQABORT( "Non-threadsave code called from two threads" );   \
00239         }                                                               \
00240     }
00241 
00242 #  define EQ_TS_NOT_THREAD( NAME )                                      \
00243     {                                                                   \
00244         if( !NAME.extMutex && NAME.id != co::base::ThreadID::ZERO )     \
00245         {                                                               \
00246             if( NAME.id ==  co::base::Thread::getSelfThreadID( ))       \
00247             {                                                           \
00248                 EQERROR << "Threadsafety check for not " << #NAME       \
00249                         << " failed on object of type "                 \
00250                         << co::base::className( this ) << std::endl;    \
00251                 EQABORT( "Code called from wrong thread" );             \
00252             }                                                           \
00253         }                                                               \
00254     }
00255 
00257     template< typename T > class ScopedThreadCheck : public NonCopyable
00258     {
00259     public:
00260         explicit ScopedThreadCheck( const T& data )
00261                 : _data( data )
00262             {
00263                 EQASSERTINFO( !data.inRegion,
00264                               "Another thread already in critical region" );
00265                 data.inRegion = true;
00266             }
00267         ~ScopedThreadCheck() 
00268             {
00269                 EQASSERTINFO( _data.inRegion,
00270                               "Another thread was in critical region" );
00271                 _data.inRegion = false;
00272             }
00273     private:
00274         const T& _data;
00275     };
00278 # define EQ_TS_SCOPED( NAME ) \
00279     co::base::ScopedThreadCheck< NAME ## Struct > scoped ## NAME ## Check(NAME);
00280 
00281 #else
00282 #  define EQ_TS_THREAD( NAME ) {}
00283 #  define EQ_TS_NOT_THREAD( NAME ) {}
00284 #  define EQ_TS_SCOPED( NAME ) {}
00285 #endif
00286 
00287 }
00288 }
00289 #endif //COBASE_THREAD_H
